DOC.brief_summary: Over 10% of adult population suffers from dry mouth (xerostomia). The aim of this double blind prospective clinical trial is to examine a new lipid based food additive formulation to ease mouth dryness in these patients.
DOC.brief_title: Lipid Based Food Additives for Treating Patients With Dry Mouth
DOC.criteria: Dry mouth patients Disabled patients Pregnant Full upper denture Under 18 years old
